page.title: 14The Area Where I Live
page.content:
The{houses}where we live are quite small; they have one dining room, one bathroom, three bedrooms, one kitchen, one living room and one attic. Around our houses are more houses.
Our{estate}is near the beach, we just have to cross the road to reach it. Around our estate it is quiet. All the houses have gardens which are quite small. The houses are spaced out a little bit.
Close by there are three big{shops} and three small shops. Our{play area} is a park which has one swing. We also play at the F.B.Fields which is a sports area.
